name: V_EHI_PTS_PB_TX_SET_BEF_INV
description: This view filters out premium billing payment data that is not appropriate for member level EHI exports when group billing is used.

columns.name: TRANSACTION_SET_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the set record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: BEF_INV_AMOUNT
columns.description: The invoice amount associated with this transaction set prior being commited.

columns.name: BEF_INVOICE_ID
columns.description: Invoices associated with this transaction set prior being commited.
